Now we consider the costs involved in Part 3. The cost of doing an inspection at \(M_1\) is $200. (Consider this cost as separate from $500.)
>>What is the expected cost is incurred at \(M_1\) per operation?<<
= 700 [Explanation] During each minute, \(M_1\) performs one operation and one inspection. Therefore the rate at which cost is incurred is just $500+$200. [Explanation]
>> What is the expected cost is incurred at \(M_2\) per operation?<<
= 450 [Explanation] The total rate at which cost is incurred is \((1-0.1)$500\). If there were no inspection, the total rate at which cost would be incurred is $500. [Explanation]
